metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13146 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: In ImageMagick before 6.9.8-5 and 7.x before 7.0.5-6, there is a memory leak in the ReadMATImage function in coders/mat.c.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> 0101-Memory-leak-in-mat-coder.patch in unstable 0298-CVE-2017-13146-Fix-memory-leak-in-ReadMATImage.patch in wheezy not fixing memory leak in trusty and xenial

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
